title: Floral Emerald, Ruby, Diamond, and Pearl Jhumka Earrings - A Symphony of Tradition and Elegance
materials: Crafted in Fine Gold (FG). Adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds totaling 1.50 carats
lush Emerald beads (4.46 carats) and Emerald many beads (5.04 carats) and lustrous South Sea Pearls (6.93 carats). Featuring a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
features: These exquisite Jhumka earrings showcase a captivating floral design. The emerald clustered stud transitions into a delicate flower design. The floral motif, enhanced by sparkling diamonds, adds a touch of modern sophistication. Pearl accents add a touch of timeless grace, while a single emerald bead dangles delicately for a playful touch.
colors: The earrings feature a rich color palette of gold
and the dazzling sparkle of diamonds. The vibrant combination is reminiscent of traditional South Indian jewelry
occasions: Perfect for special occasions such as weddings (Vivahaalu)
and other celebratory events. Their elegant design also makes them suitable for upscale parties and modern gatherings.
description: These Jhumka earrings offer a harmonious blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary style. They are meticulously handcrafted with high-quality materials, ensuring both beauty and durability. The vibrant colors and floral motif symbolize prosperity and happiness, making them a meaningful addition to any jewelry collection.
